name: etherith-memory-vault-react
description: Etherith - React + Tailwind CSS Memory Vault with Discord OAuth, IPFS Storage, and AI Moderation

scripts.build: vite build && npm run post-build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name=etherith-production
scripts.deploy: npm run build-only && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name=etherith-production
scripts.deploy-preview: npm run build-only && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name=etherith-production --compatibility-date=2025-09-21

author: Claude Code
